Generation III.Ruby: The leaves growing on Sceptile 's body are very sharp edged. This Pok é mon is very agile - it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe from above or behind.
Generation III.Sapphire: Sceptile has seeds growing on its back. They are said to be bursting with nutrients that revitalize trees. This Pok é mon raises the trees in a forest with loving care.
Generation III.Emerald: In the jungle, its power is without equal. This Pok é mon carefully grows trees and plants. It regulates its body temperature by basking in sunlight.
